pages.title: Sun Bear
pages.text: The sun bear ($(o)Helarctos malayanus$()) is a species in the family Ursidae occurring in the tropical forests of Southeast Asia.$(br2)It is the smallest bear, standing nearly 70 centimetres ($(o)28 inches$()) at the shoulder and weighing 25–65 kilograms ($(o)55–143 pounds).
